title: client problem
body: when we pick a champion and the game wants to start . at the logging screen it stop at 82percent and they wrote to mee that lol client has stoped to work ............ I've got banned what should I doo ???????? pleaaase give mee a solution

replies.body: It sucks that you're crashing, and the error doesn't seem to be telling you a whole lot.  Are you getting any other error messages like bugsplats?  How long is it stuck at 82%?  Let me know, and I'd be happy to help!
